Start: ^You are woken up by the voice of your bestfriend Ange, you open your eyes to an unfamiliar space full of repeating room and lit up by artificial light
^i don't know looks like some liminal space. you know like those stories online.

s: ^staying here won't help us let's look around for an exit.
^how did we get here ? let's try and remember our day from the start maybe it'll help.

Remember: ^well for me. this morning, i got up as usual took my breakfast and got ready for school. what about you ?
^Me it's kinda the same it's just that i was out of bread so quickly got out to buy some.
^Suddenly your friend start pulling your arm
^Look there's a tag on the wall behind you.

s: ^you turn around to look at the tag
^you try to ignore you friend nagging

Explore: ^you start walking, crossing room after room yet the scenery never change, the same wallpaper, same lighthing.
^this isn't helping, it's like we're running in circle!

s: ^you're right maybe if we tried to remember our day we could find our way out.

tag: ^yes i remember this tag, i was looking at it while i was crossing the road to the bakery
^wait you were crossing the road ? do you remember what color was the streetlight ?
ignore: ^as you try to ignore your friend to remember what you did next. they keep bothering you disturbing you train of thought

s: ^turn around to stop your friend pestering

red: ^yes that's right it was red! but there was a truck it blared it's horn at me as a warning, it went by me and then i was on the floor. wich mean i had an Accident then i must be unconscious and all of this must be my imagination
green: ^no that doesn't sounds right. i do remember people waiting waiting at the crosswalk. then there's no other choice.
ending: ^you suddenly wake up and found yourself in a hospital surrounded by your family relieved that you are awake. The hospital will release you in a few days to make sure you're fine. you'll eventually go back to a normal life. but this event has mentally scarred you for life.
